compliant.section: We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfil the purposes for which your Personal Information has been collected as outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required by law.
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization principle - Personal data shall be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed;

non_compliant.section: When your Personal Information is no longer required for the purpose it was collected or as required by applicable law, it will be deleted in accordance with applicable law.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') -  The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller the erasure of personal data concerning him or her without undue delay, and the controller shall have the obligation to erase personal data without undue delay
non_compliant.amend: You should specify that data will be deleted without undue delay, not just 'in accordance with applicable law.'

non_compliant.section: We will also by your request delete your Information collected by NUVOTON, you may contact us to process such request.
non_compliant.legal provisions:
Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject - The controller shall provide information on action taken on a request under Articles 15 to 22 to the data subject without undue delay and in any event within one month of receipt of the request.
Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') -  The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller the erasure of personal data concerning him or her without undue delay, and the controller shall have the obligation to erase personal data without undue delay
non_compliant.amend: While acknowledging data subject requests is good, the policy should clearly state the right to erasure and the one-month timeframe for responding to such requests.
